attributes.action: recommend 51 year old rap DJ Tim Westwood for a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For services to broadcasting, television, hip hop and baggy clothing, Tim Westwood's recognition is now surely overdue.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
